mapper.insert: insert into storereview (srNo, sNo, mId, mProfile, srContent, srImage1, srImage2, srImage3, srImage4, srImage5, srScore, srDate ) VALUES (storereview_sq.NEXTVAL, #{sno}, #{mid}, #{mprofile}, #{srcontent}, #{srimage1}, #{srimage2}, #{srimage3}, #{srimage4}, #{srimage5}, #{srscore}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from storereview where sno = #{sno}
mapper.update: update storereview set srcontent = #{srcontent}, srimage1 = #{srimage1}, srimage2 = #{srimage2}, srimage3 = #{srimage3}, srimage4 = #{srimage4}, srimage5 = #{srimage5} where srno = #{srno}
